name: Sabretooth
text: Hunter's Instinct — Action: Look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Put them back in any order. (Limit once per round). "I'm the best there is at what I do...just like Logan. Difference is, I do it with a smile."

name: Victor Creed
text: Apex Predator — Setup: Find the Sabretooth's Claws upgrade and add it to your hand. Action: Search your discard pile for a Sabretooth card and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

name: Mystique
text: Interrupt: When Mystique leaves play, discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. Deal damage to an enemy equal to the number of icons ([star] and [boost]) discarded this way. "Hello, dear. Did someone call for a rescue?"

name: Rip and Rend
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy and discard the top card of the encounter deck. For each icon ([star] and [boost]) discarded this way, deal 1 additional damage to that enemy. This attack gains piercing. “Ready to die?”

name: Feral Tactics
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme and discard the top card of the encounter deck. For each icon ([star] and [boost]) discarded this way, remove 1 additional threat from that scheme. “No cage, no plan, no chance. Not against me.”

name: Savage Reflexes
text: Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, cancel that card's icons and "Boost" ability. Choose to either deal X damage to an enemy or remove X threat from a scheme. X is the number of icons ([star] and [boost]) in the canceled card's boost area.

name: Ferocious Lunge
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Sabretooth's Claws → deal 8 damage to an enemy. This attack gains overkill. "Never met anyone who pushed me like the little guy. I want him dead, and I never want this fun to end. Wolverine. Can't live with him, can't live without him."

name: Relentless
text: Action: Choose a player. Give that player 1 facedown encounter card → ready your identity and draw 1 card (2 cards instead if another player was chosen). "So you're still alive. Good. I wanna kill you slow and painful."

name: Feral Vitality
text: Action: Exhaust Feral Vitality and discard the top card of the encounter deck → heal damage from Sabretooth equal to the number of icons ([star] and [boost]) discarded this way.

name: Bloodthirsty
text: You get +2 hit points. Sabretooth gains retaliate 1 and his basic attacks gain piercing. "You bleed, I feast."

name: Unstoppable
text: Interrupt: When you would be defeated, instead discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Set your hit point dial equal to the number of icons ([star] and [boost]) discarded this way. Remove this card from the game.

name: Razor Focus
text: Sabretooth gains steady. Resource: Exhaust Razor Focus → generate a [wild] resource for an event. "Try to touch my head...I'll touch your guts!"

name: Sabretooth's Claws
text: Hero Action: Discard the top card of the encounter deck → take damage equal to the number of icons on that card. Reduce the cost of the next event you play this round by the damage taken. (Limit once per round.)

name: Savage Masquerade
text: Team-Up (Sabretooth and Mystique). Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: Choose to either deal 4 damage to an enemy or remove 4 threat from a scheme.
